item.title: #1 Setup the Domain and Workstations
item.description: Disclaimer : I’m following the amazing series of video from John Hammond! I’ll edit as much as possible the code and not try to copy paste John’s work üòä All the code and information are available on my github repo : AlrikRr/ActiveDirectory_Lab Leave a ‚≠ê and follow ! Prerequisite Here is the list of stuff you’ll need to build this training lab on your own: Good PC (At least 16GB of RAM and 500GB SSD) ISO files for Windows 11 and Windows Server 2022 VMWare workstation Network Schema Domain Controller:
